reviewText:
This is one of four Naturals-series videos produced by Ron Harris. There only seams to be two of them in this once available, vhs production form. Sweet & Nasty and Pretty faces. I managed to get all four through a Chinese Hong Kong based supplier of VCDs.
In theory these and others such as 'up close and dangerous' should be available through Ron Harris Achives.
In practice though for the last ten years or so, it just hasn't happened. A constant stream of young models is a probable explanation.
These productions are quite unique. They were available on Playboy tv almost 20 years ago. There are exciting audio/visual combinations with multiple girl (all very beautiful) nude scenes. If you want to collect only the best in erotic entertainment, this would be one to consider.
